subject: Dear
body:
Dear
How are you? I hope my email will arrive to you at a good time.
I am looking for a possible tie up with a business or individual in your country so that I can do some investments there due to the civil war in my country, Syria, i wish to relocate my investment capital to your country, any viable investment idea you suggest to me will be considered.
I have a daughter; I want her to leave Syria and move to another country for a better life and better education.My investment capital is huge.
Kindly, reply to me so that we can discuss further.
Best regards,
Abdel Darbouli

subject: Re:   Dear
body:
Hello Abdel,

I hope you are doing well. I received your email and I understand your concerns regarding the situation in Syria. It's important to explore opportunities for a better future.

I would be interested in learning more about the potential investment opportunities you are considering in my country. Can you provide more details about your investment capital and what specific sectors or industries you are looking to invest in?

Also, relocating your daughter for a better life is a significant decision. Have you considered which country she might move to and what plans you have in place for her relocation and well-being?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon so we can discuss this further.

Best wishes,
Raymond

subject: Re: Dear
body:
Mr. Raymond,



Thank you very much for your reply. As I have told you in my earlier email,
I am looking for a reliable and capable partner to entrust with my funds
for investment. Considering my present situation here in our country Syria.
I and my daughter are living as refugees in our own country, I am of the
opinion that after I have established a good working and partnership
relationship, I will introduce you to a financial consultant who will work
with you in seeing that the funds are successfully transferred to you.

After you must have received the funds in your possession, you will assist
us in preparing our traveling documents to enable us to leave this country
and meet you for the sharing of the funds.

However, i want to let you know  that my intention is to invest the in any
of the followings; real estate & properties, Farming, hotels & hospitality
management, buying shares  from any of the multinational companies,
Constructions companies and also in renewable energy, you have to add more
for me if you know or have  any other investment ideas for us to invest the
money into that is of a good and profit oriented, You are going to be the
investment funding manager since, the bank is going to transfer my
 investment funds into your account in your country for the investment.

And I  hope that you will act upon our binding agreement that you will not
go against it or betray us after that the funds are released into your
account.

At this juncture, I will appreciate it if you can give me the following
information that will enable us to get a binding partnership agreement
which will be signed by both parties to avoid any misuse or abuse of trust.

The informations needed are as follows;

1. Your Full name and address
2. the name and address of your company
3. Your private telephone/WhatsApp number
4. A scanned copy of your valid ID for identification purposes.

Your early response will be appreciated .

Kind regards,

Mr. Abdel Darbouli.

subject: Re: Dear
body:
Hello Mr. Abdel Darbouli,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing your situation with me. I understand the importance of finding a reliable partner to assist with your funds during such challenging times. I appreciate your trust in considering me for this opportunity.

I am interested in learning more about the potential investment opportunities you mentioned, such as real estate, farming, hotels, buying shares, and renewable energy. It's essential to explore options that are both profitable and sustainable for long-term growth.

In order to proceed further and establish a solid partnership, could you please provide me with more details about the investment plan and how we can work together effectively? Additionally, I would like to know how we can ensure a secure and transparent process moving forward.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Raymond

subject: Re: Dear
body:
Mr. Raymond,

Sir,

Thanks for your response and I will be glad to work with you towards this
investment project. As I have stated, I want to invest in your Country. I
want to go into business partnership with you which is the reason why I
reached out to you.

 What I am seeking is a business partner that will handle the
organizational aspect of the investment while I take care of the funding.
This is why I am seeking a partnership with you so that you can provide the
required local knowledge which is very crucial.

 Meanwhile, I have in mind to go into real estate in your country but you
will still be in the best position to know the best area to invest into
that will be more profitable, so kindly advise.

  I am going to offer you a Fund Management Fee of 10% and 40% of profits
earned during the duration of the partnership which will be for a minimum
period of 10 years. My investment sum is US$30M.

Meanwhile, I would like you to detail me with your information as earlier
requested.

The information needed from you are as follows;

1. Your Full name and address
2. the name and address of your company
3. Your private telephone/WhatsApp number
4. A scanned copy of your valid ID for identification purposes.

 Looking forward to your response.

 Regards,

Abdel Darbouli.

subject: Re: Dear
body:
Hello Mr. Raymond,

Thank you for reaching out and considering me as a potential business partner for your investment project. I appreciate your interest in investing in my country and going into business together.

I understand that you are looking for a local partner to handle the aspects of the investment while you provide the funding. Real estate sounds like a promising venture, and I would be happy to provide insights on potential areas for investment.

Before proceeding further, could you please share more details about the investment project? It would be helpful to know the specifics before moving forward.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Raymond

subject: Re: Dear
body:
Hello Mr. Raymond,

Thank you for reaching out with this investment opportunity. I appreciate your interest in working together on a project in my country. Real estate can be a lucrative venture, and I'm interested to learn more about the specifics of your proposal.

Before proceeding further, could you please provide me with more details about the investment project? For example, what specific type of real estate investments are you considering? Additionally, it would be helpful to understand the expected timeline and any potential risks involved.

I look forward to hearing back from you with more information.

Best wishes,
Raymond

subject: Re: Dear
body:
Hello Mr. Raymond,

Thank you for reaching out with this investment opportunity. I appreciate your interest in working together on a business venture in my country. Real estate can be a promising sector to invest in, and I'm glad to hear that you are considering it.

Before we proceed further, could you please provide more details about the specific type of real estate projects you are interested in? This will help me better understand how we can collaborate effectively.

Additionally, I would like to know more about the Fund Management Fee and profit-sharing structure you mentioned. It's important for both parties to have a clear understanding of the financial aspects of our potential partnership.

Looking forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Raymond

body:

subject: Re: Dear
body:
Mr. Raymond,

Thank you very much for your email. Can you please detail me with your
personal information to enable my lawyer start to process the
documentations in your name.
Thanks,

Mr. Abdel.

subject: Re: Dear
body:
Hello Mr. Abdel,

I appreciate your email. Could you provide more information about the process you mentioned? I would like to understand how it works before sharing any personal details.

Best wishes,
Raymond
